attributes.action: dick the the legend downie to be knighted
attributes.additional_details:
This man has went above and beyond to help others laugh dance and have a bloody good time. Anybody who has had the pleasure or fortune to come across the man the myth the legend will never forget what pure joy and fun he brings to the table. This great human being has single handed put pakora sales through the roof and kept glens vodka in business. So lets get this great man/entertainer where he belongs as a knight of this great country we call Britain.

Thanks
